title: A Residential Permaculture Design in under 30 seconds

tasks.task: Planting corn seed into prepared soil
subtasks: Walking behind farming equipment
Operating a tractor or similar machine

Ensuring proper seed placement and depth

subtasks: Visiting different areas in the field
Observing plant health and development
Noting the presence of weeds or other issues

subtasks: Loading herbicide into sprayer tank

subtasks: Adjusting the trailer coupling

Unloading equipment onto the trailer

subtasks: Securing a hay bale onto the tractor's fork
Driving the tractor to the barn door
Navigating around farm structures and obstacles
Delivering the bale to the barn
Unloading the hay bale from the tractor

tasks.task: Using GPS technology to guide farming equipment
subtasks: Entering field coordinates into the GPS system
Following guided routes marked by GPS

tasks.task: Reporting machine hours to the appropriate department
subtasks: Accessing the machine hour log
Recording the time spent on each field work

tasks.task: Guiding a large machinery through narrow fields
subtasks: Staying constantly aware of the machine's surroundings

Adjusting speed to minimize ground disturbance

subtasks: Inspecting equipment for necessary repairs
Performing cleaning and lubrication on machinery

subtasks: Positioning the hay rake on the tractor
Connecting the drawbar and safety chain
Activating the hydraulics to lower the rake

tasks.task: Operating a swather machine to cut crops
subtasks: Guiding the swather through the field
Adjusting raking knives for proper crop cutting

tasks.task: Assisting with transporting vehicles between fields
subtasks: Loading farm equipment onto a vehicle
Driving the vehicle across the field
